title: How to Use Isopropyl Alcohol as a Deodorant

steps.title: You can purchase isopropyl alcohol at a pharmacy or corner store.
steps.content: You can purchase isopropyl alcohol at a pharmacy or corner store. Any brand should work just fine for this. Before you go any further, do a spot test on your skin to confirm you won’t have any adverse reactions.

steps.title: Use a totally clean spray bottle to avoid contamination.
steps.content: Use a totally clean spray bottle to avoid contamination. It’s hard to apply the alcohol straight from the bottle, so fill a small spray bottle to contain your deodorant.

steps.title: This should keep your underarms smelling fresh.
steps.content: This should keep your underarms smelling fresh. Reapply the alcohol whenever you feel like you need a little refreshing. Avoid using the alcohol after shaving your armpits. The alcohol may sting and cause skin irritation.
